text: Katherine Virginia "Kassie" DePaiva (n√©e Wesley; born March 21, 1961) is an American actress and singer-songwriter. She is best known for her role as Bobby Joe in the horror movie Evil Dead II (1987). She is also known for her role of Blair Cramer on ABC's One Life to Live. Other roles included Chelsea Reardon on Guiding Light, and her current role as Eve Donovan on NBC's Days of Our Lives. DePaiva was born in Morganfield, Kentucky. In August 2016, DePaiva announced she had been diagnosed with acute myeloid leukemia.Kassie DePaiva battling leukemia", nydailynews.com; accessed September 6, 2016. ==References== ==Other websites== * The Kassie DePaiva Page * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American video game actors Category:Writers from Kentucky Category:Actors from Kentucky Category:Singers from Kentucky
title: Kassie DePaiva
